fever: Fever is common. Drink water, rest, and take paracetamol. If it lasts long, consult a doctor.
cold: Cold is usually viral. Stay warm, take steam, and use nasal drops or paracetamol.
headache: Headaches may be due to stress or screen time. Rest and hydrate. If persistent, see a doctor.
cough: Cough may be dry or wet. Use cough syrup, honey, or turmeric milk. Visit doctor if it worsens.
covid: COVID-19 symptoms include cough, fever, fatigue, loss of smell. Take a test if unsure.
